items.description: Card data. Field names match the ones in Lithic's card schema

spend_limit.description: Spending limit of card (in cents). If not provided, spending is still subject to the spend limit set at the issuer processor account (if any).

type.description: The type of card being returned

state.description: The current state of the card

token.description: Unique external identifier for the card

last_four.description: Last four digits of the card

memo.description: Friendly name to identify the card
